scripts.android-build-apk-dev: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/development/release
scripts.android-build-apk-staging: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/staging/release
scripts.android-build-apk-prod: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProdRelease && open app/build/outputs/apk/prod/release
scripts.android-build-aab-dev: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevelopmentRelease && open app/build/outputs/bundle/developmentRelease
scripts.android-build-aab-staging: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew bundleStagingRelease && open app/build/outputs/bundle/stagingRelease
scripts.android-build-aab-prod: yarn generate-android-jsbundle && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && open app/build/outputs/bundle/prodRelease
scripts.start: watchman watch-del '../mobile-nutri' ; watchman watch-project '../mobile-nutri' && npm run start-metro
scripts.podm1: cd ios && arch -x86_64 pod install && cd ..
scripts.generate-android-jsbundle: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle
scripts.all: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf yarn-lock.json && rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -fr $TMPDIR/metro* && yarn install && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.cp:release-update-dev: read -p 'Enter target version: ' value && appcenter codepush release-react -a phong.na-kyanon.digital/NOM-Development-iOS -d Staging -k code_push_config/nom_dev_cp.pem --plist-file ios/NOM/NOMDevelopmentInfo.plist --xcode-project-file ios/NOM.xcodeproj -t $value && appcenter codepush release-react -a thang.vo/Nutri-Beta-Android -d Staging -k code_push_config/nom_dev_cp.pem -t $value
scripts.cp:release-update-staging: read -p 'Enter target version: ' value && appcenter codepush release-react -a phong.na-kyanon.digital/NOM-Staging-iOS -d Staging -k code_push_config/nom_dev_cp.pem --plist-file ios/NOM/NOMStagingInfo.plist --xcode-project-file ios/NOM.xcodeproj -t $value && appcenter codepush release-react -a thang.vo/Nutri-Android-Staging -d Staging -k code_push_config/nom_dev_cp.pem -t $value
scripts.cp:release-update-production: read -p 'Enter target version: ' value && appcenter codepush release-react -a phong.na-kyanon.digital/NOM-iOS -d Production -k code_push_config/nom_cp.pem --plist-file ios/NOM/NOMStagingInfo.plist --xcode-project-file ios/NOM.xcodeproj -t $value && appcenter codepush release-react -a KD_Hermes/Nutri-android-Production -d Production -k code_push_config/nom_cp.pem -t $value
